questions.title: Userstyle CSS for ZeroNet?
questions.body:
I figured I'd whip up a quick stylesheet for [Kiwipedia](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1KiwiBCVBUcuypVm8FEmUW9YT6fJDXkN9r/). However, none of the entered CSS in stylus nor stylish seem to apply to the page. Upon further investigation, it didn't work with *any* ZeroNet site.

Is there something special that needs to be done? Any help would be appreciated. Thanks!
